name: Fell Seal: Arbiter's Mark - Demo
description:
Fell Seal: Arbiter's Mark is a turn-based tactical RPG with a focus on storytelling and character customization.
The game features striking 2D hand-drawn art and a complex and deep class system.

Take control of the Arbiter Kyrie, an agent of the Immortal Council, tasked with preserving order and stability in the realm.
As you gather an army of custom recruits and storied characters, you'll have to battle your way across memorable environments and custom-created encounters. To unravel the mysteries and dangers of the land, you'll have to carefully craft your recruits into unique and versatile combatants, combining more than 20 classes and 200 abilities.

Notes:

  • This is an early demo of the game, showing the first 4 story battles.
  • The game works fine with mouse and keyboard, but it is recommended to play with a gamepad for the best experience.
  • Most sounds are placeholders.
